description: A pilot descends on a planet where something strange is going on. When he arrives at a scientist's camp, there's no trace of humans. Only robots are left and their behaviour is strange. Where did the humans go?

name: Where's Mom
description:
Peacefully in the autumn forest lives you, mom and sick sis.
One day you must watch over your sick sister so mom can leave to brew a potion for her. But she never comes back, where's mom?

name: Winchester
description: Annabelle is on her way home to San Francisco when she crashes her car. Her injuries lead her to the house, and the history of all that has happened within. Mrs. Hannover lives here, and has forced her help onto Annabelle. The house is off-putting and soon reveals its secret history to Annabelle, who becomes increasingly desperate to escape.

name: The Winter Rose
description: An evil ice-dragon has settled in once lush and forested land, blighting it with eternal winter. Only a young archer has the determination -and the wits - to end his wicked reign of terror. Help Rose through this epic quest.

name: Wraith
description: Wraith is a fantasy role-playing game like the author's previous effort Shadowforge, although it's set in a larger, more detailed world with an updated and expanded rule system. The worship of Metiria is being subverted all over the realm of Araithia; lords and commoners have turned their devotion to a newly-arrived evil power, the Wraith, whose monstrous armies now infest the island. You, guardian of the last Temple of the True Faith, are summoned to seek out and eliminate this evil.

name: The Yellow Rose Motel
description:
The yellow rose motel is a ps1/VHS style low poly psychological thriller set in a mysterious motel designed to leave your soul terrified.

After a long day of work and stress John (player) arrives in a place called Yellow Rose Motel, which at first seems like a family-friendly loving place turns into a nightmare in less than a day.

name: Azure
description: In this near-future 3D first-person action shooter, you play a gun for hire, piloting a bipedal mech to tear down the enemy frontlines. Your missions involve on-rails segments where you shoot foes using a reticule, plus off-rails maze exploration with combat and collectibles. Can you survive this mechanized war, protect your companions, and seize victory?

name: Yggdrasil Chronicles: A Tale of Cindrivia
description: Hundred years ago, The Illuminati Order, originally formed by a demon named Lucifer, plunged the whole world into Chaos. With his mighty power, he slowly corrupted this living world, driving the humanity to an extinction. Fortunately, six remarkable warriors, calling themselves Warriors of The Holy Alliance, possessed the power of faith and justice, stood against The Illuminati as the last hope of Cindrivia. With the help of the Heavenly Artifacts sent down by Aina The Goddess of Night, they finally put an end to Lucifer and his Illuminati Order. The world of Cindrivia then found peace again for decades. Many years have passed, and now The Illuminati Order is about to raise again, lead by a mysterious wizard so-called Ryan The Illuminator. The existence of Cindrivia and even The Yggdrasil Tree is in danger one more time.

name: Massive Cleavage vs Zombies
description: It's a zombie apocalypse horror story, told through arcade style fighting, and cut scenes. Your character wanders the city in search of supplies for her people, using only her massive cleaver. Every place she goes she leaves behind piles filled with hundreds zombie corpses.

name: You Just Died
description:
You Just Died. In this game you play as Davey. He wakes up in his childhood home, it's different, yet familliar. Where will he end up while wandering through this dreamy interpretation of the afterlife? And will you find out the dark truth about his past?

Keep your eye's open, you won't see everything on the first playthrough...

name: Ultimate Doom the Way id Did
description:
A custom Doom 1 level pack released in 2019 that takes over the Episode 4 slot of The Ultimate Doom. Created by various mappers from the Doom modding community, 'Ultimate Doom the Way id Did' is an attempt at replicating the style of the various mappers that contributed to the original Episode 4 of Doom and its difficulty.

This level pack is 9 maps long, and occupies the entirety of Episode 4. No other new maps occupy the first 3 episodes, and this can be seen as an expansion to 'Doom the Way id Did', released in 2011.

name: You and the Night
description: You are traveling alone - just you, your broken car, the fog and the dull countryside. You are tired and you take a break in a small family hotel. You're engulfed in silence - you sit and wait like you always did - it's just you and the night.

name: The Never Ending Game
description: Play this addicting and never ending game! Good luck with this crazy challenging game!

name: You Just Don't Get Stars Like These Back Home
description: Explore a campground and night and try to find the darkest spot, so you can see the most stars in the sky.

name: Really Scary
description: Explore a real world haunted house. Avoid possessed teddy bears and twisted monstrosities. Solve puzzles and search for clues. Will you unravel the mystery before your fragile mind collapses into insanity? Probably not.

name: Lootfest2
description: Lootfest is back for everyone who loves classic adventure games. With more monsters, weapons, missions and of course - more loot! Explore a large world with your friends, using an easy drop-in multiplayer. Any combination of split screen and online gameplay is supported.

name: GOG Collection Shooter Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Kingdom's Life
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeon of the Endless: Definitive Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: GOG Adventure & Puzzle Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Colors: Zero
description: Colors:Zero is an interactive storytelling set in a neo noir universe. You will play as a detective and will be assigned to investigate about strange murders.

name: Zealot
description: You have been summoned by your Masters to perform the final ritual atop the Eternal Peak. Survive hordes from the space between the stars, using your reflexes and shooting skills until the Ritual is complete. Do not fail your Masters.

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - Yamaha Pack
description:
Start your engines! Purchase the Yamaha Pack and experience real off-road riding!
This pack includes the following vehicles:

Yamaha YZ250F MX
Yamaha YZ450F MX
Yamaha YZ250 MX
Yamaha YZ450 MX
Yamaha YFZ450R ATV
Yamaha YFZ450R SE ATV

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - Honda Pack
description:
Start your engines! Purchase the Honda Pack and experience real off-road riding!
This pack includes the following vehicles:

Honda CR 125R MX
Honda CR 250R MX
Honda CR-F250 MX
Honda CR-F450 MX
Honda TRX450R ATV

name: Train Sim World 3: Bahnstrecke Bremen - Oldenburg
description: Take a trip to the late 2000s and experience frequent passenger and heavy freight services, be in control of classic and modern traction as you traverse through the heart of Northern Germany. Electric Containers and Karlsruher Kopf n-Wagens await in Train Sim World 3: Bahnstrecke Bremen - Oldenburg.

name: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia: Premium Edition
description:
Little Mouse's Encyclopedia is ideal for born explorers. Wandering around the lively boards, you’ll find animals and plants by yourself. Using a magnifying glass, you can reveal cards that contain interesting information and drawings.

With a brave mouse, you’ll explore the area around its burrow, walk through the forest, sneak through the garden and swim in the pond. In each of these places, unique species of animals and plants await you. During your wandering, you’ll come across over 160 unique species, about which you can learn something interesting.

name: Montezuma's Revenge
description:
This is the official version of the 80's classic game Montezuma's Revenge rebooted by the original developer. It's the classic puzzle solving action adventure platformer you loved in your youth.

Unlike the switch port, this port adds a "Modern Mode" visuals.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Qube GE C44aci Pack
description: The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed by UGL Rail and built at the Broadmeadow factory. It is operated by a number of rail freight operators. The design is based on the National Rail NR class but with some modifications and upgraded features.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: ANR DL Class Australian National Pack
description: Built between 1988 and 1990, the Australian National DL class locomotives were introduced for both passenger and freight service across Australian National's standard gauge network from Adelaide to Broken Hill, Alice Springs, and Kalgoorlie. This pack features 4 versions of the class in AN livery.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: ANR DL Class Australian National Pack
description: Built between 1988 and 1990, the Australian National DL class locomotives were introduced for both passenger and freight service across Australian National's standard gauge network from Adelaide to Broken Hill, Alice Springs, and Kalgoorlie. This pack features 4 versions of the class in AN livery.

name: Trainz Plus: ANR DL Class Australian National Pack
description: Built between 1988 and 1990, the Australian National DL class locomotives were introduced for both passenger and freight service across Australian National's standard gauge network from Adelaide to Broken Hill, Alice Springs, and Kalgoorlie. This pack features 4 versions of the class in AN livery.

name: Dinogen Online
description: Action-packed 2D multiplayer top-down shooter. Play as a human or dinosaur with hundreds of weapons, game modes, and maps!

name: Pattaya
description: This is an AVG, a GALGAME, a visual novel, a funny and hilarious game. In this game, our protagonist Dude and his friend Jimmy will go together to visit the charming streets, pubs, yoga studio, massage shop and hotel of Pattaya, Thailand.

name: Backrooms: Apprehension
description: A terrifying and immersive multiplayer horror experience with social deduction elements. Survive as a scientist stuck in the Backrooms, just be very careful who you trust, someone is not what they seem!

name: Square Life
description: Why do you need the company of beautiful women to do a simple thing?

name: This This Rice
description:
Simulator game made in Hong Kong.
Pack the lunch box.
Take the money.

name: Your Train
description: This is a simulation game of driving a train to transport customers on a Japanese railroad line.

name: Pottery
description: Pottery is a VR simulator that makes everyone feel like a real potter. The simulator reproduces the main stages of the production of pottery: the selection and preparation of clay, the creation of a workpiece blank, the processes of drying, painting, firing and glazing the product.

name: Boundary Walls
description: Overview: You are a source of light trapped inside walls and you need to escape from these walls surrounded by various traps, but how? The light sources you find around open a gateway for you to move on to the next level, and you can only get out of here by collecting them.

name: Bad Cat Sam
description: The cat, named serious Sam, is very upset when the house is in order and everything is in its place. Help Sam get inner peace.

name: Rogue Planet 1: Consolidation
description: A standalone expansion to the original game, set 2 years after the original. The climactic finale and final chapter of the first game. Your interpetation of the truth will affect the world around you, and more importantly, the people living in it. Be careful. Imaginations can be powerful things...

name: Zog Moonbuckle: The Mysterious Planet
description: During a journey home from the far reaches of space, you are forced to crash-land on a mysterious planet not on any of your star charts. Faced with the challenge of repairing your damaged spaceship, it soon becomes clear that you've become involved in something altogether more interesting...

name: Quick Rally
description:
Quick Rally.
An arcade casual fastest time chaser.
Compete on the leaderboard against friends or anyone in the world to set the fastest time on each track.
A weekly challenge track, with a new track each week and a fresh clean leaderboard to compete for the best time.

It’s time to put your trains on rails and build a global railway empire. Become a railway tycoon and enjoy a beautiful train simulation journey full of surprises, achievements and challenging contracts.

name: Card Brawl: Dungeon Slayer
description:
Magical spires have risen across the land causing discord and chaos... No longer a mere shopkeeper, the fate of Aragonia now lies in your hands...
Choose your path in procedurally generated dungeons and employ unique strategies with each playthrough! Slay your way to the Elite Boss at the end of each dungeon to unlock new cards for your collection and carve your name in history as the top ranked card brawler across Aragonia! Immerse yourself in a turn-based Roguelike CCG like no other, where you must randomly draft cards as you progress through each spire, testing the limits of your wit and skill with each battle.
Collect powerful cards to create epic combos, wield masterful strategies by unlocking mighty heroes and their unique skills, gear up heroes with legendary equipment and turn the tides of battle across PvE and PvP by unleashing a well-timed spell! In Card Brawl you draft cards as you progress making each level more interesting than the last!
What are you waiting for? Install Card Brawl for FREE to experience the mayhem of roguelike card battles and join the millions of players around the world in the Arena to forge your legacy!

name: Think! Think! Monsters
description:
Think! Think! Monsters is a battle-puzzle game made for players aged 10+, made by the creators of Think!Think!, an award-winning educational app by Hanamaru Lab, Ltd. The game is designed to train players’ brains, and to show them how to enjoy using their own critical thinking skills to solve a problem.
In the battle system, players are securely matched up in teams with other players. If there are no other players to connect to, players will battle along side AI units.

name: Weeny Adventure
description:
Weeny adventure is a tiny challenging platformer game in pixel art style like an old-school game that brings back childhood memories.

Your mission is to run and jump and to grab all the gems before time runs out to find the hidden map to win the level. Your adventure journey is not easy, because you will encounter deadly traps and dangerous monsters.

name: Speed Intense Island
description:
If you love cars, tuning and playing car or motorcycle racing games then this game is for you!
It's the only car and motorcycle racing video game on Reunion Island.
Reunion is a beautiful island located in the Indian Ocean at the east of Madagascar.
The tracks you will drive on in this game take place on the main roads of the island.
Discover the beautiful landscapes that actually exist while racing.

name: 2048 Numbers Mania
description:
2048 Numbers Mania will test your mathematical skills and ability to problem solve, despite its simple design.
Your ultimate impossible goal is to continually think about how to add pairs in order to clear more space on the board. Sounds simple? It's not!

name: Feed the Cat
description:
Feed the cat - is a colorful puzzle game with simple controls. The goal of each level - to feed the sweets of all kittens.
Sweet gesture can move your finger across the screen, snacks will move through the cells vertically and horizontally in all directions.
When the sweetness gets into a cat, he eats it and goes to sleep, becoming an obstacle.
Avoid black holes - they suck sweets forever, and some cat will remain without food and will be sad as grumpy cat.

name: Swapologic
description: Swapologic is a challenge you will enjoy. Your mission is to solve the logic puzzles in each row by swapping tiles. As you complete each puzzle, the row will be eliminated and you will score.

name: Merge 5: 10x10 Color
description:
Merge 5 is a new Block Match puzzle game.
Train your brain and develop your logic with this simple game that lets you combine puzzle blocks in 10x10 grid, build and destroy structures by creating new color shapes.

name: Butterfly Sky
description: Use your jumping skills and time your landings to collect butterflies in this massively addicting endless-jumper that will have you saying, “just one more round!” It’s up to Brian to feed the picky whale who doesn’t eat fish. Collect and upgrade 4 handy power-ups while jumping on clouds in the sky. Upgrade your clothing, your house, and even your power-ups using your hard-earned butterflies. And don’t forget to level up your character for bigger bonuses and score multipliers!

name: Bouncy! Trampoline
description: Bouncy is a rabbit who loves to jump on his trampoline. Touch or slide to make Bouncy jump and do tricks!

name: Ocean Drift
description:
Humans have surpassed their limits and have evolved to this point mainly because their skills have been tested and improved. While numerous games try to do something similar, none seems to do it as well as Ocean Drift, a new and exciting arcade game with a simple premise that will keep you coming back for more.
Drag your thumb on the screen and watch the boat drift through the sea!

name: Don't Be Greedy
description:
This is a game about not being greedy.
Basically, it is very easy. So it is hard not to be greed or hasty when you play it.
If you are not being greedy, you will get a high score.
Tip: When Bunny is on a blue pad, the progress is saved. So that you can continue from the saved point when you re-launch the game.

name: Box Heap
description:
Box Heap is an addictive mobile game with a simple gameplay and easy to learn and master.
Drag the block to match 2 or 5 blocks of the same color. These blocks will change to a new block.

name: Sheep Launcher 2
description:
The much anticipated sequel to the original hugely popular Sheep Launcher is now available and running beautifully on the new iPhone5 in full Retina Display!
Explore an infinite universe with strange new worlds. Battle the massive Martian Overlord and his minion to earn the rights to space travel. Check out the new Style Shop and show off your cool new threads. Use home grown and advanced Martian tech to power up and go farther than ever before!

name: SuperPro Snowboarding
description:
Start as an amateur and try and make it as a pro! Win contests, earn sponsorships, do photo shoots to build notoriety, and, if you're good enough, you'll get invited to the SuperPro Games!
Outfit your rider with authentic gear from Neff, Sandbox, Bataleon, Switchback Bindings, Lobster Snowboards, YES Snowboards, NOW Bindings, Airhole Facemasks, Endeavor Snowboards, Skullcandy and Whitegold Snowboards.

name: Amazing Wire
description: Creeping... slinking... gliding... I am a weird wire with a weird hobby of sneaking through tiny holes!

name: EcoDriver
description:
With EcoDriver it’s not the fastest driver who wins, but the most clever!
Test your driving with EcoDriver in an endless, randomly generated environment! This exciting game shows you the advantages of driving safely, economically and in an environmentally friendly way.

name: Rocket Road
description:
Dodge your way through traffic with blasting speed! Put to the test your dexterity as reflex is everything to avoid crashing. Travel and discover all the different roads. How far will you get?
You can now play Rocket Road on Bet4Fun against your Friends! Click on the Bet4Fun button in the Main Menu and challenge your friends and players from all over the world.

name: Jalebi: A Desi Adda
description: Let’s play all your favorite games – Word Search , Ludo , Snakes and Ladders , Quiz , Word Hunt and 4 Letters games in one single pack. India’s first-ever game center, Jalebi – A Word Game now becomes Jalebi – A Desi Adda with 6 games in 1 pack. Now play word search , Quiz , Word Hunt and 4 letters Word puzzle games in your own language (English, Hindi, Gujarati, Marathi, Bangla / Bengali, Odia, Malayalam, Kannada, Tamil and Telugu) and also you can play Ludo , Snake & Ladder with localized UI.

name: Cat 2048 Story
description:
Cat 2048 Story is an addictive digital game, puzzle game.
Join the cats and get to the tile, they are the 2048's multiple, they are growing step by step. Swipe to move all tiles. When two tiles with the same cat face touch, they merge into a upgrade one. You can choose different type to enjoy. Adventure or time model for you explore.

name: Eras of Alchemy
description:
Help! Earth has been mostly destroyed by an asteroid.
My name is H.E.R.A. Will you help me resurrect all of Earth's creatures?
HERA, the Holographic Earth Revival Alchemist, awakens one day to find Earth destroyed with little life remaining. The planet depends on you. Using the combined powers of science and HERA's alchemy pods, can YOU help repopulate Earth? Discover the combinations to create creatures and advance through eras of time!

name: Mutant Roadkill
description: Race through an apocalyptic wasteland overrun with mutants and other hazards! Blast your way through city ruins as you try to escape a world overrun with danger. Drive as far as you can and compete against the world on the online leaderboards! Can you make it out alive?

name: Monkeynauts: Merge Monkeys!
description:
Since the dawn of time, monkeys have had only one thing on their minds. BANANAS!?! Well... yes. But who doesn't love bananas???
But also... OUTER SPACE!!!
Yes it's true! Historians agree that MONKEYS, not humans, single-handedly pioneered the global space program. And now these adorable "Monkeynauts" are ready to blast off to NEW worlds to meet their extra-terrestrial, banana-eating brethren.
Begin your epic journey on Earth and wield the power of evolution! Merge matching monkeys to unlock new, unbelievably CUTE & quirky evolutions. Accelerate your orbital dreams and get closer and closer to powering your rocket ship!

name: No Play No Die
description: An addicting game that tests your reflexes. More challenging, more anomalous and more addicting.

name: Narcos: Cartel Wars Unlimited
description:
Build your empire. Gain power. Destroy your enemies. Lead your own cartel in this strategy game based on the hit series.
Enter the world of Narcos: Step into the dangerous and thrilling role of cartel kingpin in the official strategy game based on the hit Netflix series. Decide between ruling with an iron fist and gaining respect through loyalty. Sometimes bad people do good things… In the end, you must decide will it be “Plata o Plomo”?
Learn the ropes of running an operation from drug lord El Patron himself and manage your “relationship” with the authorities through DEA agents Murphy and Peña.

name: Soccer Slam!
description:
Tap the players to keep the ball in the air.
Try to get all three medals!

name: Flat Fat Cat Bounce
description:
Bruno is our male cat, he wants to bring more joy and fun into his life by bouncing other flat fat cats together. Help him on his journey by crashing him, just like you would do on an air hockey or billiard table, into other fat cats.
You just need to do a swipe and see Bruno bouncing over the floor. This is not so easy however: Every room offers a diversity of obstacles: Simple furniture, chihuahua dogs, fans or color buckets which creating so much fun.
Explore Bruno's crazy adventure and experience hundreds of different levels. Master the challenges awaiting you on the hockey table!

name: Happy Pet Balance: Which is the heaviest?
description:
Which is heavier? A pot of plants or Professor Albert? A holiday gift box or 3 fishes? Let's find out! All is not as it seems!
Figure out each object's mass using the weighing scales and select the heaviest item! As more stages are cleared, more weighing scales and objects will be added! Happy Pet Balance is a fun brain training game that keeps you on your toes. Time is ticking. Think fast, act fast!

name: Clock Smith
description: ClockSmith helps you train your memorization skills with beautiful mechanical clock. Get better at memorizing long numbers and symbols. After using ClockSmith, next time you will have to quickly remember something, it will be easier.

name: Super Ball Juggling
description: How many times you can juggle these two balls?

name: Vwls: A Game About Vowels!
description:
Vwls is a game all about Vowels. Did you get it?
Word finding has never been trickier and fun when all you have are scrambled consonants aided by a clue. Find the vowels, find the word.

name: Tezuka World: Astro Crunch
description: Enter the world of the Father of Manga: Osamu Tezuka! Here, Tezuka classics such as Astro Boy, Black Jack, Princess Knight, Triton and more have come together to star in a grand adventure full of puzzles and nostalgia!

name: Magic Colors 2
description:
Magic Colors2, Challenge your thinking!
Magic Colors is a creative geometric jigsaw puzzle game that requires you to successfully put together the colorful triangles at their places within the hexagons. An image pattern of the final colored hexagons is given for all levels and try your best to match them in as LITTLE moves as possible!
In Magic Colors2, the graphics of the game are improved greatly. More patterns and three hexagons are introduced; it’s a challenge for your thinking!
It’s free for all levels! Get ready to train your brain!

name: International Boxing Champions
description:
Unrelentingly fast paced, Boxing action. Beautifully rendered and animated, high resolution and high definition graphics.
Compete against boxers from all over the world each with their own distinctive style of fighting. Unload on your opponent with jabs, straight punches, hooks and body shots before finishing them off with super combos.

name: Space Station: Frontier
description:
A deep space mining operation should be a peaceful job, not when a mysterious alien race is violently contesting the territory!
Harvest precious energy, fortify your station, build up your firepower to defend humanity's domain on this new frontier!

name: Dungeon & Dice
description: Sin descripción

name: Sibijicheon M
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonyeojeonjaeng: Hwansangui Cheonhatongil-jeon
description: Sin descripción

name: Warcraft 2000: Nuclear Epidemic
description: In 1998 the GSC Game World studio tried to introduce itself to the Western video gaming market by making its first real-time strategy game. For that, the developers decided to make their own sequel to Warcraft II, using their own engine that would be used later for the Cossack games.

name: Squitter's Spider Quest
description:
Every level is now played with Squitter!

Levels have had their objects rearranged to make sure Squitter can get through them safely.

name: Gun Fever
description:
A game based on the popular cartoon series named Gun Fever.

The Wild West is covered by a terrible epidemic. Indians, cowboys and settlers are suffering from it. This disease is called "Revolver Fever." Shoot first, or lie in a coffin!

Lots of adventures await you in the role of the character of the game. He came from the cartoon and looks too cheerful for the Wild West. Naturally, bandits and other moral monsters, like the evil sheriffs, do not like it. But you have a true Colt, while your Colt has bullets!

name: Astro Smash 'n' Blast!
description:
The sky is falling! The sky is falling!

Your base of operations is the last line of defense against an imminent disaster. Big rocks and lil rocks are pounding the earth. Making matters worse, extra terrestrials or some rogue government are sending over spinner missiles and pulsar bombs designed to end your day and make sure you and yours can never phone home again.

name: Pixel Rooms
description: A new evolution of escape-the-room games. Clear each room and escort Mr. Pixel to victory. Plus a speedrun mode with global rankings.

name: Crazy Freekick
description: There is a very strange defender in front of the goal. Ninja, sumo, animal, trap, and quizzes. Let's goal using a technique and brain!

name: Star Fox EX: Exploration Showcase
description:
This romhack boasts dozens of amazing additions and features, including, but not limited to:

A brand new map with 17 new levels, new bosses, music, backgrounds, enemies and more!
A 3+ page pre-game menu to customize your experience!
Use the SNES Mouse, Super Scope, NTT Data Pad or Multi-Tap for a new way to play!
Play with 2/3/4/5 people, AI controlled teammates, or ships all controlled by player 1!
Wireframe mode, grid lines, palette changes and more!
Customize your player ship and crosshair style with new crosshair functionality!
A full model test viewer, BGM/SFX test menu and Super Scope Calibration screen!

name: Bantumi
description: Kalah for the Nokia 3310

name: Wipe Factor
description: Wipe Factor is a multiplayer party game where you and other contestants compete as a team to overcome various physical obstacles and parkour chaos until one team wins!

name: GeneRally 2
description: GeneRally 2 is a top-down arcade racing game with a built-in track editor. Challenge the track records in time-trial; compete on the sofa with friends; or let your creativity flow by creating your very own racing tracks to share with the world!

name: Chronicon: The Mechanist
description: Play as the Mechanist, laying waste to your foes with high tech weaponry and machinery! Equipped with a medium range Gun, an Axe for close encounters (or throwing!), and a Jetpack for mobility, the Mechanist is an intense and powerful class.

name: Underlien: Safety Zone
description: Sin descripción

name: Project: Mirror
description: Project: Mirror is a world full of magic, their souls of beautiful girls have broken into several pieces during a violent and powerful storm. You are the only one who can help the beauties revive their souls!

name: Flat Affect
description: A young girl wishes she was a hotel room

name: Castlevania Chronicles II: Simon's Quest
description:
A fanmade remake of Castlevania 2: Simon's Quest is offering a whole new way to play the most infamous entry in Konami's classic vampire-hunting series.

Back in 1995, Konami released Castlevania Chronicles on PS1, which remade and remixed the original Castlevania for then-modern standards. Now, in 2023, the fan studio WarMachine has released Castlevania Chronicles 2: Simon's Quest, which takes the same approach for the divisive NES sequel.

This remake takes the bones of Simon's Quest to craft a whole new game. You still explore an open-ended overworld, get hints from NPCs, and explore dungeon-style mansions to acquire key items. But the world has been remixed, the mansions have been completely revamped, and the old currency system has been completely revamped.

name: Willy's Horrorland
description: In 2021, Eric Moore moves to Midtown to start his life over from scratch in a new city. Looking for a new job, he finds an establishment called "Willy's Restaurant" that is hiring staff to guard the place also doing janitor work after his night watch.

name: A Blast from the Past
description: A Blast from the Past is a stunning, classic arcade shooter. Includes gameplay modes for the casual gamer through to "Tournament Mode" for Hi-Score hunters! With 4K/360Hz+ support, experience smooth as silk gameplay in this dazzling arcade blaster with something for every arcade-going fan!

name: Escape Covid Camp
description:
Sent to camp against your will, find a way to escape to freedom. Craft goods to trade with other inhabitants for objects to use in your planned escape. Can you strategize and execute an escape plan through the perimeter of patrolling guards?

Contained within a world of steel, this is not the life you chose. Explore your new home that saps the souls of all who it contains. Fabricate a plan to escape this world force upon you. Freedom is your mission.

name: Hitman World of Assassination
description:
Become Agent 47 in the ultimate spy-thriller adventure across more than 20 locations.

Hitman World of Assassination brings together the best of Hitman, Hitman 2 and Hitman 3 including the main campaign, contracts mode, escalations, elusive target arcades and Hitman: Freelancer.

name: Hitman 3 Access Pass: Hitman 2 Standard
description: Purchasing or redeeming this Access Pass will grant access to the locations from 'Hitman 2 - Standard Edition' in Hitman 3. You must own Hitman 3 to access this content.

name: Hitman 3 Access Pass: Hitman 1 GOTY Edition
description: The Hitman 3 Access Pass system allows you to access Hitman 1 and Hitman 2 locations in Hitman 3. Purchasing or redeeming this Access Pass will grant access to the locations from 'Hitman 1 - GOTY Edition' in Hitman 3. You must own Hitman 3 to access this content.

name: Sanctuary Saga
description: Protect your caravan and face the brutal Untamed Wilds in roguelite turn-based RPG Sanctuary Saga. Engage in row-based combat across multiple varied biomes and keep your group together using a dynamic relationship system.

name: Strayed Lights
description: An atmospheric action adventure combining a wordless experience with cinematic fights based around colors. Restore your light that was torn by shadows and face endearing creatures deformed by their emotions.

name: Eon of the Green
description: In this text based RPG you play as an agent exploring Earth's far future. Receive weird visuals from lifeforms on the brink of extinction. Can you decipher their meaning? Eon of the Green is a game about the psychological stresses of mental time travel.

name: Luckily, My Arm is a Shotgun
description: You are lost on a cursed island full of monsters... Luckily, your arm is a shotgun! Explore a mini open world and blast your way through waves of demons in this short adventure.

name: Aeterna: Rubra Plena
description: Aeterna: Rubra Plena is a visual novel otome game about happy romance, and dealing with depression, anxiety, and trauma. You play a beautiful young noblewoman dealing with her current and past experiences while finding love.

name: Puzzle Bobble 2X/Bust-A-Move 2: Arcade Edition & Puzzle Bobble 3/Bust-A-Move 3: S-Tribute
description: Enjoy new features in Puzzle Bobble 2X and Puzzle Bobble 3, games where you shoot bubbles that pop when 3 or more of the same color stick together.

name: Forgotten Seas
description: Craft a 'Ship in a Bottle' and set sail! You are lost in a Bermuda Triangle void. Land is scarce, and the ocean is treacherous. Dread Pirates rule the seas. Experience a survival adventure filled with sailing, plundering, base-building, crafting, treasure hunting, trading, and Pirate Ship combat.

name: Rogue Planet 1
description: Rogue Planet is a short action horror FPS game based on the Mayan Phenomenon of 2012. Made over the course of 3 years as my first game using GameGuru. A personal passion project.

name: WikiParty.org
description: A game that will take you on a journey through the world of Wikipedia!

name: Hi-Fi Rush
description: As wannabe rockstar Chai, you’ll fight back against a sinister robotics enhancement conglomerate using rhythm-amplified combat where everything – from the motion in the environment to the blows of combat – is synced to the music.

name: Pikmin 2 Multiplayer
description: Pikmin 2 campaign but you can play with up to 3 friends! Also featuring a huge cast of playable characters, and other features.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Necrom
description: Traverse the Telvanni Peninsula in Morrowind and preserve secrets ascribed to the unfathomable realms of Apocrypha. Unlock the runic power of a brand-new class - the Arcanist - and fight to uphold reality itself.

name: Fallen London: A Devil's Due
description: This is a DLC for the game Fallen London. It is part of the Exceptional Stories, a monthly release of new stories that are available for subscribers (Exceptional Friends) for free, and available for purchase afterwards.

name: Fallen London: Salon Scandal!
description: This is a DLC for the game Fallen London. It is part of the Exceptional Stories, a monthly release of new stories that are available for subscribers (Exceptional Friends) for free, and available for purchase afterwards.

name: De-Ja II
description: Like its predecessor, De-Ja II is a Japanese-style adventure. The interface has been enhanced compared to the first game. Most of the commands are still done via the extensive verb menus and object sub-menus; once again, it is usually necessary to use those commands several times in order to gain new information and thus advance the story. However, in certain places, icon-based interface becomes available, with point-and-click interaction. The icons include traditional talking, touching, as well as less common commands such as hitting, and even an icon depicting a condom, for... err... scientific activities that are closer to anatomy than archeology.

name: Fallen London: The Mushroom's Dream
description: This is a DLC for the game Fallen London. It is a Festive Story, a yearly end of the year release that is available for purchase.

name: Fallen London: Stolen Stanzas
description: This is a DLC for the game Fallen London. It is part of the Exceptional Stories, a monthly release of new stories that are available for subscribers (Exceptional Friends) for free, and available for purchase afterwards.

name: Jan Jaka Jan
description:
Jan Jaka Jan is a mahjong game in its core, the majority of the gameplay dedicated to mahjong matches (two- as well as four-people) against a variety of opponents. The player can navigate the protagonist around the top-down town and enter various locations, which are viewed from first-person perspective.

The player is also able to buy items to increase his parameters during mahjong matches and encounters of sexual nature.

Cut scenes occur before and after mahjong games, and many matches and other events are dictated by the story. Defeating a female mahjong opponent usually leads to cut scenes that depict nudity and sexual situations.

name: Wendy's Quest
description: Venture to find your friends and complete Wendy's Quest.

name: Hop Swap
description: Hop Swap is a 2D platformer where you have to go through a world full of obstacles and traps. The problem? With just one touch you change worlds: the top and the bottom.

name: Mullet Hell
description: Blast your way through hair curling enemies to prove you are worthy of the mullet! Mullet Hell is a casual rogue-like, reverse bullet hell where you must fend off foes who seek to remove your luscious locks from your head.

name: Growling In My Demise
description:
Mekra D. needs to get away.
This is a very short, nice little pocket game.

name: Castlevania: Specter of Sorrow
description: Specter Knight is now in Dawn of Sorrow! Start a game in Specter Mode to slice and dice your way through the castle using Specter Knight’s diagonal slash while engaging in mini-platforming challenges! Many rooms are tweaked for Specter Knight’s movement and there’s little secrets all around the place to allow for 100% map completion.

name: Koopa CD
description:
Koopa is sent to the past by the Toads in the future as they plan to corrupt everything in that time.

This was a submission for the SMB Jam 22, and it is a small but complete overhaul of the game. This entry scored 3rd place out of the 11 contestants.

name: Pokémon PureBlue
description: This is a purist's enhancement of Pokémon Blue. The goal is to enhance the original games for excellent replayability without bringing in mechanics, moves, sprites, visuals, type matchups, or Pokémon that were introduced in later games. The 2.0 version is based on the disassembly and has hundreds of new optional features / fixes!
